head.supplied: ¶ In accordance with the given instructions Mr Renner reported himself to the Secretary of the Mines Department yesterday, and commences work there this day. ¶ Ferd. von Mueller ¶ 31/3/92...

div.p: V93/4386, unit 750, VPRS 3992/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

MS is an annotation on a large file concerning the transfer of Gerhard Renner from M's staff to the Mines Department and his subsequent return a year later. It comes immediately after an annotation by Wilson dated 28 March 1892 directing M ‘to instruct Mr Renner to report himself to the Secretary Mines Department with as little delay as possible’. See also M to G. Bell, 24 June 1893 (in this edition as 93-06-24b).
In accordance with the given instructions Mr Renner reported himself to the Secretary of the Mines Department yesterday, and commences work there this day.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
